original_text: At midnight the Lord struck down all the firstborn in the land of Egypt, from the firstborn of Pharaoh who sat on his throne to the firstborn of the captive who was in the dungeon, and all the firstborn of the livestock.
korean_text: 밤중에 여호와께서 애굽 땅에서 모든 처음 난 것 곧 왕위에 앉은 바로의 장자로부터 옥에 갇힌 사람의 장자까지와 가축의 처음 난 것을 다 치시매

sentences.original_text: At midnight the Lord struck down all the firstborn in the land of Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 밤중에 주께서 이집트 땅의 모든 장자를 치셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: from the firstborn of Pharaoh who sat on his throne
to the firstborn of the captive who was in the dungeon
and all the firstborn of the livestock.
